Ross Patterson and Jarred Taylor welcome his new bride "Velvet Dame" to the show to discuss their recent marriage, how they make it work with his ex-wife and kids, why they love gas station food, what it's like to watch your wife doing porn, and most importantly what it was like having sex with James Deen and Evan Stone.
